Dear Mr. MULVANY:
This letter is a follow-up to the Departmentâ€™s findings regarding the interim inspection
conducted at your facility on 01/27/2021. The purpose of this inspection was to determine
compliance with applicable licensing statutes and administrative rules for Court Operated
Residential Care Facilities.
Your facility is in compliance with all applicable licensing statutes and administrative rules.
Please contact me with any questions. In the event that I am not available and you need
to speak to someone immediately, please contact the area manager at (616) 552-3662.
Sincerely,
Rorie Dodge-Garnaat, Licensing Consultant
MDHHS\Division of Child Welfare Licensing
